您已成功激活诗人记忆，请赏析第四节诗歌。
For oft, when on my couch I lie In vacant or in pensive mood, They flash upon that inward ey Which is the bliss of solitude; And then my heart with pleasure fills,And dances with the daffodils.

Firstly, the poet writes daffodils, and in the last part, he writes about the daffodils’ healing power. He writes both objective things (daffodils) and subjective feelings. The poet and daffodils are connected to each other, and the empty mind can be healed at any time through this infinite spiritual wealth. \n 诗人先写水仙, 最后再写水仙对诗人的魅力, 写的既是客观之物 (水仙) , 又是主观之情 (诗人)。诗人与水仙心灵相通,无论何时都能通过这种无穷的精神财富使百无聊赖的心灵空虚和精神颓唐得到治愈。
